attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY TERRIBLE🤮
attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP IT HAS THE WORST FEEDBACK EVER.I WAS TOLD MEAN THINGS AND SO WAS MY DAUGHTER PLEASE DO NOT DOWNLOAD.I NO LONGER SUPPORT TRUMP.HE TOLD ME TO GO KILL MYSELF!!!!WORST PRESIDENT EVER.

attributes.title: This app made my dad leave.
attributes.review: may i say that this app is the WORST APP i have EVER seen, as soon as i down loaded the app being the white racist supremest i am🥳 since i have 0 brain cells i just wanted to help support my lord and savior donald trump🙏🙏👀 i opened the app and it started asking me very inappropriate questions about MY personal life. like when was the last time i had a sexual relationship with a female and a little wiper snapper. LIKE I HAVE DONT HAVE A SEXUAL RELATIONSHIP WITH A CHILD, that is so two years ago, anyways then it called me and karen to tell us if i don’t vote for DONALD TRUMP i will be not allowed to go do anymore fun things like my kids soccer games and bingo night every tuesday.never again.

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: First of all whywould you ban tiktok.the app is terrible.took a long time to download.and my non racist president is kweeking.so it takes a long time to load and i dont like it.its laggy too.do not recommend.❤️❤️

attributes.title: Trump2002!!! 🇱🇷🇱🇷
attributes.review:
Dear Donald Jenius Trump,

        This app is absolutely unacceptable! 😞 I am a true Trump supporter (since 2001)- a Trump-sexual 🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺🥺 if you will, but I have never been more frustrated with an app in my holy, republican, white supremest life 😡! Not only did it take months to download, it also made my pet raccoon bright black 😱 it even had orange 🍊eyes!!!! But that is perfectly okay because now it has our Orange 🍊 God’s skin color as eye ballz 🤠🤠 Our melatonin king 😏 #stanlilhuddy2020 🧕🏿🥵 Chille Anyways I expected more from you Donald! 😈😈 You’ve done so well at Making America Great Again and I thought this app would be great too. 😟😔 Sadly, it was not. My iCloud storage is now completely full even though I bought extra. 😖😖 Yes Donald, EXTRA storage for your “great app”! 😾😾 My photos app is full with pictures of Miss Addison Raecist 🤨🤨!!! I expected way more from you my king. When I first opened the app, they asked for my phone number?!?!?? 😒😒 I could not believe it. I AM A MARRIED DIVORCED GRANDMA OF 69 COWS. HOW DARE YOU TRY AND HIT ON ME LIKE THAT? 🙄🙄🙄#enddomesticabuse 🧚🏻‍♀️💫 I am disgusted with this. 🪐👄😽 Donald, don’t get me wrong, I love the red, white, and blue but I think we should change it to yellow and black, don’t you think? The Manny will not be televised 🤕👹😘😁😜. To my fellow conservatives voting for Trump on November 4th, please DO NOT 🚫🚫 download this app because it will make your pet horse 🐴 kick your husbands baby chicken 🍗 in the stomach causing it to lose all sense of birth 💔😿🥀 That is all I have to say for today, follow my Instagram @jcaquelyne 😺😺. Good luck Charlie xoxo, 
     -Jessica from Planned Parenthood 💘✨ *Stay safe and don’t use birth control 😁 wait until marriage 😃* All men is trash expect for Noah Beck 🥰😍😇👁👅👁 #acab #blm #bunkerboy💋💋

attributes.title: BAD DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: When I was just voting for Trump for 2020 I was gonna do something but my gut all raised the storm account on roblox and everything no I will not vote Trump for 2020 he sucks😓😓😰😰😰😨😨😨😨😱😱🥶🥶🥶🥵🥵🥵

attributes.title: Literally the worst thing ever
attributes.review: This is the most garbage thing probably to ever happen in history, and I know my history. 46 mb? Nah this thing took 60 gigs and I had to delete all my games. Took like 10 weeks to download. After that you’d think this app would be the best thing ever right? 😂 not even close. It’s just a white page that says “this one more way D.J. Trump is turning America into his personal glory hole” with animations of Trump spinning turn tables and thrusting at me. Now I’m just creeped out and concerned for my safety tbh.

attributes.title: Would you rather?
attributes.review: I would rather do a a lot of things than use this app. I would rather live in North Korea. I would rather travel to that sh*t hole country Africa. I would rather live in Puerto Rico during the hurricane. I would rather be on the other side of the wall. I would rather stand up with myAfrican American brothers and Sisters. I would rather wear a mask.

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: it took almost 2 years to download and i’m just trying to support my amazing wonderful hot funny sexy president but i can’t bc his app is so f-ing slow. once i finally got on the app it immediately crashed and froze and was overall a horrible app. i do not recommend getting this app. the app also proceeded to ask for my location and then i turned it on and a swat team showed up in my house.

attributes.title: scary clown man
attributes.review: i opened the app and had the fright of my life from a big ugly scary orange clown man. he scared me too much that i was forced to delete the app. i will have nightmares for the rest of my life. 100000000000000000000000/10 would not recommend unless you like being absolutely terrified.
